altername_name: Wheel of Fortune: HF Special Edition V3.2
name: Wheel of Fortune: HF Special Edition
overview: In the original versions of Wheel of Fortune created by I.J.E Inc, some versions in conjunction with Softie Inc had a major flaw, bad randomization of questions and an error where some sets of questions would never be used. BYB, of Hokuto Force, fixed the randomizer and allowed the game to present every possible puzzle in addition to improving the fastloader. After finishing a complete games round, puzzles used are saved together with the highscore to disk, meaning your next game and the following ones won't repeat for a very long time. A computer version of the popular game show Wheel Of Fortune, where you guess letters until you can guess the phrase. Three old-school rounds of Wheel of Fortune (where the puzzles are simply "Phrase", "Title", "Person", etc.) and then a bonus round. You can compete against 2 computer players or up to three people can play against each other.
